reporting-org.narrative: Aapasi Sahayog Kendra Syangja Nepal (ASK Nepal)

description.narrative: 1. Increase climate change adaptation capacity of marginalize through organic farming methods, sustainable manage solid waste and business promotion. 2. climate change adaptation policy will be implemented by the local government.

participating-org.narrative: Aapasi Sahayog Kendra Syangja Nepal (ASK Nepal)

activity-date.narrative:  980 households will be able to climate change adaptation through increased knowledge about sustainable ecological farming.  40 households will be able to increase the capacity about solid waste management to adopt about climate change.  265 households will be able to increase the extra income (Nrs. 11505) and build up capacity to climate change adaptation.  15% extra income will be increased by the establishment of of organic home stay and support to climate change adaptation.  3 ponds will be conserved and support to the ecosystem balance and reduce the water scarcity.  3 water spouts will be conserved and support to the ecosystem balance and reduce the water scarcity to the 150 households.  2 rural municipalities will be able to approve the policy in relation with climate change adaptation and implementation.  2 rural municipalities and 1 municipality will be able to apply building construction code of conduct in relation with climate hazard and monitoring system.  2690 households including 2216 children will be able increase the knowledge about climate change adaptation through information, education and communication (IEC) events.
